metadata.title: CVE-2018-18521 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Divide-by-zero vulnerabilities in the function arlib_add_symbols() in arlib.c in elfutils 0.174 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) with a crafted ELF file, as demonstrated by eu-ranlib, because a zero sh_entsize is mishandled.

criterions.comment: elfutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.176-1.1').
